Changes.LogName: Elias - Reject Sunberry Fish While Compendium In Progress

Entries.RejectItem_(O)skellady.SBVCP_AzureanCarp: $query PLAYER_HAS_MAIL Current skellady.SBVCP_DonatedFish_AzureanCarp Received#{{i18n:Elias.FishCompendium.AlreadySeen}}|{{i18n:Elias.FishCompendium.NewFish}}#$action AddMail Current skellady.SBVCP_DonatedFish_AzureanCarp Received#$action IncrementStat skellady.SBVCP_SunberrySpeciesCaught 1
